meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or segments.
meanings.sent1: The trimerous flower had three colorful petals.
meanings.sent2: The trimerous plant had leaves grouped in threes.
meanings.sent3: The trimerous puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her trimerous necklace symbolized unity, strength, and love.
meanings.sent5: The trimerous design of the building made it stand out in the cityscape.

meanings.sent1: The trimerous pattern on the fabric was eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The trimerous structure of the molecule fascinated the scientists.
meanings.sent3: The trimerous cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His trimerous approach to problem-solving always led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The trimerous arrangement of books on the shelf made it easy to find each one.

meanings.sent1: The trimerous cake was perfect for sharing among friends.
meanings.sent2: The trimerous division of the garden created a harmonious balance.
meanings.sent3: The trimerous sections of the painting told a unique story.
meanings.sent4: The trimerous structure of the essay made it clear and organized.
meanings.sent5: The trimerous composition of the music piece captivated the audience.
